parameters.name: History
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display the history of applying the alert templates to application groups. Valid values:

*   true
*   false (default)

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword of the alert template name.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the alert template.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   true (default): ascending order
*   false: descending order

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The sorting basis. Valid values:

*   gmtMotified: sorts alert templates by modification time
*   gmtCreate (default): sorts alert templates by creation time

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert template.
